#include<bits/stdc++.h>
typedef long long ll;
using namespace std;
#define gc getchar_unlocked
inline void scanint(long long int &x)
{
    long long int c = gc();
    x = 0;
    long long int neg = 0;
    for(;((c<48 || c>57) && c != '-');c = gc());
    if(c=='-') {neg=1;c=gc();}
    for(;c>47 && c<58;c = gc()) {x = (x<<1) + (x<<3) + c - 48;}
    if(neg) x=-x;
}
ll max(ll a,ll b)
{
    if(a>b)
        return a;
    return b;
}
ll a[102][102];
ll e[35][35][35][35];
ll fun(ll x1,ll x2,ll y1,ll y2,ll v)
{
    if(x1>x2||y1>y2)return 0;
    if(e[x1][x2][y1][y2]!=-1)
        return e[x1][x2][y1][y2];
    ll f1=0,f2=0,f3=0,f4=0,i;
    for(i=x1;i<=x2;i++)
    {
        f1+=a[i][y1];
        f2+=a[i][y2];
    }
    for(i=y1;i<=y2;i++)
    {
        f3+=a[x1][i];
        f4+=a[x2][i];
    }
    ll ans=max(f1*v+fun(x1,x2,y1+1,y2,v+1),f2*v+fun(x1,x2,y1,y2-1,v+1));
    ans=max(ans,f3*v+fun(x1+1,x2,y1,y2,v+1));
    e[x1][x2][y1][y2]=max(ans,f4*v+fun(x1,x2-1,y1,y2,v+1));
    return e[x1][x2][y1][y2];
}
int main()
{
    ll t,n,i,j;
    scanint(t);
    while(t--)
    {
        ll n,m;
        memset(e,-1,sizeof e);
        scanint(n);
        scanint(m);
        for(i=0;i<n;i++)
        {
            for(j=0;j<m;j++)
                scanint(a[i][j]);
        }
        ll ans=fun(0,n-1,0,m-1,1);
        printf("%lld\n",ans);
    }
    return 0;
}
